stimulusHtml: Which of the following is the most practical solution to maximizing energy production at wind farms while minimizing the risk to wildlife?
choicesHtml: Turn on turbines only at night when most birds and bats are not flying.
Turn off turbines during periods of maximum migration.
Turn on turbines only when winds are below 5mph.
Limit the height of turbines to 10 meters and the width of the blades to 5 meters.
